message.content:
Find the main hero image or logo used on the homepage of this Astro site. Check:
1. src/pages/index.astro - look for the hero section and what image it uses
2. src/components/HeroSection.astro - look for the main image/logo reference
3. src/components/Header.astro - check the logo used in the header
4. Any CSS or config files that reference the main logo

Report the exact file paths and image paths being used.

content.text: I'll search for the hero image and logo used on the homepage. Let me examine the key files.
Perfect! I found the information. Let me also check if there are any other image references in the site config.

content.content:
1→/**

content.text: Now let me verify that these image files actually exist in the public assets directory.

content.content:
-rw-r--r-- 1 V 197121  22K feb. 11 18:32 gelchile-electrodo-grafito.webp
-rw-r--r-- 1 V 197121 3,3K feb. 11 21:25 gelchile-logo.webp

content.text: Perfect! I have all the information. Here's my complete report: ## Homepage Hero Image and Logo Report ### Main Logo (Header) **File Path:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\public\assets\img\gelchile-logo.webp` **Usage Location:** `src/components/Header.astro` (line 26) ```html ``` **Details:** - Logo is displayed in the header navigation bar - Size: 250px wide × 63px tall - Format: WebP - File size: 3.3 KB - High priority fetch for fast loading - Responsive sizing on mobile (140px on small screens, 180px on tablets) - In dark mode, it gets a white background pill styling (line 324) --- ### Hero Section Product Image **File Path:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\public\assets\img\gelchile-electrodo-grafito.webp` **Usage Location:** `src/components/HeroSection.astro` (line 66) ```html ``` **Details:** - Displays a 1:1 aspect ratio product image (electrodo/electrode) - Size: 500px × 500px - Format: WebP - File size: 22 KB - Eager loading and high fetch priority for LCP optimization - Responsive sizing (hidden on mobile, 400px on tablets, 500px on desktop) - Includes a floating animation (6-second infinite loop) - Has a radial glow effect behind it --- ### Primary Image Used for Preload **File Path:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\public/assets/img/gelchile-electrodo-grafito.webp` **Usage Location:** `src/pages/index.astro` (line 18) ```html ``` This image is preloaded in the MainLayout for improved Core Web Vitals performance. --- ### Summary | Element | Image Path | Location | Dimensions | |---------|-----------|----------|-----------| | **Header Logo** | `/assets/img/gelchile-logo.webp` | Header navigation | 250×63px | | **Hero Product Image** | `/assets/img/gelchile-electrodo-grafito.webp` | Hero section right column | 500×500px | | **Preload Image** | `/assets/img/gelchile-electrodo-grafito.webp` | MainLayout meta | (preload hint) | Both images are WebP format for optimal performance, and the hero product image serves as the main visual element on the homepage representing GelChile's primary product (electromagnetic electrode).
